attributes.action: Bitcoin to be considered as a legal tender
attributes.additional_details:
People living in poverty have had issues with accessing banks. 
Financial inclusion is a building block of the solution to the brutal reality for Europeans minorities exposed by the much higher than average COVID-19 impact, not receiving stimulus checks or benefits. 

Access to the financial system stimulates economic growth, brings financial stability and provides wealth building tools. The fastest and most impactful route to financial inclusion of the unbanked is through legislation, regulation, and proven technologies integrated with the existing financial system.
attributes.background: Consider Bitcoin as an alternative way of paying and transferring money.

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

Legal tender is only applicable in very limited circumstances. You can find out more here:

https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/knowledgebank/what-is-legal-tender
